item.description:
Hi Everyone,

How about a meet-up for lunch, hike, and a tour at Appleton Farms in Ipswich Ma.? The weather should be nice enough (fingers crossed) for a picnic lunch, and to enjoy the beautiful views, fields and trails.

It would be great to get a good mixed group of men and women out in nature to meet, and make connections!

The tour starts at 3:00, but if we meet earlier, we can lunch and do a hike on the trails! Or, just explore for a while.

Farmstead Tour
Date: Sunday, April 5, 2009
Time: 3:00 PM to 5:00 PM
Location: Appleton Farms
This leisurely walk reveals Appleton family tales and includes a visit to the dairy during milking time â€“ ordinarily closed to the public.

Fees: Members: $4. Nonmembers: $5.
Telephone: 978-356-5728 x15
item.name: Appleton Farms - Hamilton (Hike/Tour)
